titles.title: A resolution honoring the 40th anniversary of Naval Submarine Base Kings Bay in Kings Bay, Georgia.
A resolution honoring the 40th anniversary of Naval Submarine Base Kings Bay in Kings Bay, Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Honors the Naval Submarine Base Kings Bay on its 40th anniversary and commends the men and women who have worked and trained there.
Honors the people of Camden Country and the Georgia coastal communities for their support of Naval Submarine Base Kings Bay.
